name: Golden Hour (ERlCA)
description:
Golden Hour is a 3D photography simulation game that captures the experience of a serene end to the day. While sunset glows over the landscape, players are encouraged to wander around and take photos. It is meant to be a relaxing immersion of the magical time that is golden hour.

Right click to get camera out

Press C to take photo (only nine films, use wisely)

Press P to see photos (after taking them all)

WASD to move, space to jump

R to reset, Q to quit

Music by Angela Yena Kim
